name: conditionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in way that depends on something else being done: Six prisoners were released conditionally. The club announced they had conditionally agreed a £22m deal. See
conditional
More examplesFewer examplesThe agency can approve, conditionally approve, or reject the application.They told the Americans that they were ready to surrender conditionally. No one tracks the number of students admitted conditionally.
